Package com.mycompany.proxyclientebroker

Class ProxyClienteBroker

java.lang.Object
com.mycompany.proxyclientebroker.ProxyClienteBroker
All Implemented Interfaces:
IProxy
public class ProxyClienteBroker extends Object implements IProxy
Clase que representa al proxy del lado del cliente.
Author:
Equipo Broker.
